SEARCH
Module FoundationsF25_2
Package jUnitTesting

Class TerminalOutputTests

java.lang.Object
jUnitTesting.TerminalOutputTests
public class TerminalOutputTests extends Object
Test class for terminal validation of database I/O boundaries and invalid inputs.

This suite ensures the application correctly handles:

  • Boundary Value Tests — Field length constraints for posts and replies.
  • Coverage Tests — Fetch and update operations using invalid identifiers and data types.

All tests are isolated: a new database connection is established for each test case.

Version:
1.2
